```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
data("mtcars")
mtcars$model <- rownames(mtcars)
head(mtcars)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data = mtcars, 
       aes(x = mpg, y = qsec,
           label = model, 
           group = gear, 
           color = gear)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(formula ='y~x',
              method = "lm", 
              linewidth = .15) + 
  ggtitle("mpg vs. qsec in the mtcars dataset, per gear.") + 
  theme_bw() + 
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 10)) + 
  theme(panel.border = element_blank())
```
